data.comment: The first-half is under way at Riverside - Middlesbrough kick-off to start the match.
The first half has been concluded at Riverside.
In the minute 46, Reading kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Neil Warnock is making the team's first substitution at Riverside with Marvin Johnson replacing Britt Assombalonga.
Liam Moore (Reading) has received a yellow card from Darren Bond.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Lucas Joao with Alfa Semedo.
Omar Richards (Reading) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sam Morsy (Middlesbrough) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, At Riverside, Tom Holmes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team have replaced Yakou Meite with George Puscas. This is the second substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
Paddy McNair is booked for the home team.
In the minute 81, Djed Spence is replacing Marcus Tavernier for Middlesbrough at Riverside.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a third substitution, with Sone Aluko replacing Michael Olise.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
